name: easy-autocomplete
title: jQuery plugin for autocompletion
author: Łukasz Pawełczak (http://github.com/pawelczak)
readme: *Jquery autocomplete plugin* Visit EasyAutocomplete page http://easyautocomplete.com. You can find there full documentation guide on how to use EasyAutocomplete plugin. File location: -------------------------------------- - Distribution files Javascript, CSS are in `dist` folder, - Source files are in the folder `src`, - Simple examples, that presents usage of plugin can be found in folder `demo`, - Tests for the plugin are located in folder `test`. License: -------------------------------------- Code released under the MIT license.
